sentences.en: A single piece of glass stretches from the hood to the rear, acting as hood, windscreen, roof, and rear window.
sentences.cn: 一整块玻璃覆盖从引擎盖到车的后部，可以充当引擎盖，挡风玻璃，天窗和后窗。

sentences.en: Any crack in a car windscreen always seems to be right in the driver's line of vision.
sentences.cn: 汽车挡风玻璃上的任何一条裂缝看起来总是正对着司机的视线。

sentences.en: As she was thrown forward, the cake went right through the windscreen and landed on the road.
sentences.cn: 当她由于惯性向前一冲的时候，蛋糕被甩出了挡风玻璃，落到马路上。

sentences.en: At 420mph the windscreen disintegrated.
sentences.cn: 挡风玻璃在时速420英里时破碎。

sentences.en: Frost on the windscreen obstructed the driver's view.
sentences.cn: 挡风玻璃上的霜挡住了司机的视线.

sentences.en: In the crash the driver ( was ) catapulted through the windscreen.
sentences.cn: 在事故中司机从挡风玻璃中 ( 被 ) 弹了出来.

sentences.en: My breath had begun to steam up the windscreen.
sentences.cn: 我的呼吸使挡风玻璃布满水汽.

sentences.en: My daughter painted a scarlet bear on the windscreen of our car.
sentences.cn: 我女儿在我们的挡风玻璃上画了一只鲜红的小熊。

sentences.en: Perhaps you can see to the windscreen wiper - they got stick.
sentences.cn: 也许你能检修一下挡风玻璃的刮水器 -- 它们乔不动了.

sentences.en: Perhaps you could see to the windscreen wipers - they get stuck.
sentences.cn: 也许你能检修一下挡风玻璃的刮水器 -- 它们刮不动了.

sentences.en: She found a rose tucked under the windscreen wiper of her car one morning.
sentences.cn: 一天清晨，她发现自己汽车的挡风玻璃雨刷下插着一支玫瑰。

sentences.en: She tore the windscreen wipers from his car.
sentences.cn: 她猛地扯掉他车上的雨刷。

sentences.en: The attendants fill the tank, clean the windscreen, and add some air to the tires.
sentences.cn: 服务人员加满油箱，清洁挡风玻璃，把轮胎打一些气。

sentences.en: The bullets ricocheted off the bonnet and windscreen.
sentences.cn: 子弹从汽车引擎盖和挡风玻璃上弹飞了。

sentences.en: The car windscreen frosted over during the night.
sentences.cn: 汽车的挡风玻璃在夜间结了霜.

sentences.en: The speed of the windscreen wipers is variable .
sentences.cn: 汽车挡风玻璃上雨刷的速度是可变的。

sentences.en: The speed of the windscreen wipers is variable.
sentences.cn: 汽车挡风玻璃上雨刷的速度是可变的.

sentences.en: The stone shattered the windscreen.
sentences.cn: 石头砸碎了挡风玻璃.

sentences.en: The windscreen was covered with frost.
sentences.cn: 挡风玻璃上结了霜.

sentences.en: The windscreen wipers thudded back and forth.
sentences.cn: 挡风玻璃上的雨刮“啪嗒啪嗒”地来回摆动。

phrases.tran_cn: 挡风玻璃刮水器；风档雨雪刷

trans.tran_en: the large window at the front of a car, bus etc
